shared.model.board

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.board.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the representation of an Edge on a game Map
    Author:
    Raul Lopez

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private EdgeDirection direction
      Direction of the edge described with EdgeDirection

      The list of HexTile that the edge relates to
      private EdgeLocation location
      Location of the edge described with EdgeLocation
      private Road road
      The Road that the edge has on it, is initially null

      • hasAdjoiningPiece

        Determines whether the User has an adjoining Piece on this edge
        Parameters:
        user - the given User
        Returns:
        true if a building or road is adjoining to the current edge, false otherwise
